Class Slot

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
Slot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Slot extends Observable implements Serializable
Slot This class handles the state of each slot in the game. Extending observable in preparation for the addition of a GUI.
Version:
Assignment Hand-In - PE7070
Author:
Lauren Scott & Byron Glover
